content.prompt: Physiological population density is viewed as a superior measure of population density for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: It is more reflective of population pressure on arable land.
It is more reflective of the world’s largest population concentrations.
It measures the average by dividing total land area by total number of people.
It best reflects the percentage of a country’s population that is urbanized.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
